title: Ford Just Reported an Absolute Collapse in Its EV Sales. That Could Be a Key Warning for Tesla Stock.
description: Ford’s EV sales just fell off a cliff, and Tesla investors should start paying attention now.
content: Automaker Ford Motor Company (F) just delivered a troubling signal for the electric vehicle (EV) industry. The company reported a 0.9% drop in U.S. unit sales for November, and while its internal-com… [+6966 chars]
